active_learning.discussion_prompt: In groups, debate the trade-offs of warm sites versus hot and cold sites for a mid-sized e-commerce company facing cyber threats. Consider RTO/RPO requirements, costs, scalability, and security implications. Which option is optimal and why? Be prepared to present your group's consensus with supporting evidence from NIST SP 800-34.

active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
